title: Pset_SpaceThermalPHistory
description: Thermal and air flow conditions of a space or zone. HISTORY: New property set in IFC 2x2.

CoolingAirFlowRate.title: CoolingAirFlowRate
CoolingAirFlowRate.description: Cooling air flow rate in the space.

HeatingAirFlowRate.title: HeatingAirFlowRate
HeatingAirFlowRate.description: Heating air flow rate in the space.

VentilationAirFlowRate.title: VentilationAirFlowRate
VentilationAirFlowRate.description: Ventilation air flow rate in the space.

ExhaustAirFlowRate.title: ExhaustAirFlowRate
ExhaustAirFlowRate.description: Exhaust air flow rate in the space.

SpaceRelativeHumidity.title: SpaceRelativeHumidity
SpaceRelativeHumidity.description: The relative humidity of the space.
